name: Heat Transfer Fluid S5 T
description: Synthetic Heat Transfer Fluid for high temperature heat transfer systems, particularly for the concentrated solar power industry

globalDocs.name: Heat Transfer Fluid S5 T EN TDG V1.1 27-Feb-2020

localDocs.name: Heat Transfer Fluid S5 T Spain ES 140003966322 EHS V2.1 03-JUL-2023
Heat Transfer Fluid S5 T Spain EN 140003966322 EHS V2.1 03-JUL-2023

marketing: Shell Heat Transfer Fluid S5 T is a synthetic fluid based on Biphenyl/Diphenyl Oxide mixture that provides stable heat transfer performance in both liquid and vapor phase with excellent thermal stability at ultra-high temperature (400°C/750°F). With a low viscosity through the wide work temperature range, Shell Heat Transfer Fluid S5 T provides uniform indirect heat transfer highly efficient.
